mapper.select:
SELECT FROM t_ware_entrymainorder
and f_status in (#{status1,jdbcType=INTEGER},#{status2,jdbcType=INTEGER})

SELECT
t
ORDER BY f_id DESC
ORDER BY ${orderField}

SELECT e.f_id, e.f_order_number, e.f_shipment_number, e.f_shipment_date, e.f_plate_number, e.f_total_quality, e.f_delivery_date, e.f_transport_type, e.f_carrier, e.f_phone_number, e.f_carrier_unit, e.f_carrier_unit_code, e.f_reservation_date, e.f_shipment_remark, e.f_contract_number, e.f_contract_date, e.f_origin_warehouse_code, e.f_origin_warehouse_name, e.f_into_warehouse_code, e.f_into_warehouse_name, e.f_delivery_require, e.f_remark, e.f_entry_complite_date, e.f_status, e.f_created_date, e.f_created_person_id, e.f_created_person, e.f_updated_date, e.f_updated_person_id, e.f_updated_person, e.f_entry_channel_code, e.f_transport_code, e.f_is_delete, ed.f_mater_code, ed.f_mater_name, ed.f_quality, ed.f_batch_no, ed.f_mater_version, ed.f_mater_cigbrand, ed.f_actual_quality, ed.f_produce_date, ed.f_subver_id, ed.f_subver_name FROM t_ware_entrymainorder AS e left JOIN t_ware_entryorderdetail AS ed ON e.f_id = ed.f_mainorder_id WHERE ed.f_batch_no = #{batchNo}
SELECT COUNT(1) FROM t_ware_entrytraylocalmap twl WHERE twl.f_orderdetail_id IN ( SELECT twe.f_id FROM t_ware_entryorderdetail twe WHERE twe.f_mainorder_id = #{mainorderId} ) AND twl.f_status = 0
SELECT * FROM t_ware_entrymainorder WHERE f_shipment_number= #{shipmentNumber} AND f_is_delete = 0
SELECT * FROM t_ware_entrymainorder WHERE f_contract_number= #{contractNumber} AND f_is_delete = 0

SELECT elm.f_id,e.f_order_number,e.f_shipment_number,e.f_shipment_date,e.f_plate_number, e.f_total_quality,e.f_delivery_date,e.f_transport_type,e.f_carrier,e.f_phone_number, e.f_carrier_unit,e.f_carrier_unit_code,e.f_reservation_date,e.f_shipment_remark, e.f_contract_number,e.f_contract_date,e.f_origin_warehouse_code,e.f_origin_warehouse_name, e.f_into_warehouse_code,e.f_into_warehouse_name,e.f_delivery_require,e.f_remark,e.f_entry_complite_date, e.f_status,e.f_created_date,e.f_created_person_id,e.f_created_person,e.f_updated_date,e.f_updated_person_id, e.f_updated_person,e.f_entry_channel_code,e.f_transport_code,e.f_is_delete, ed.f_mater_code,ed.f_mater_name,ed.f_quality,ed.f_batch_no,ed.f_mater_version,ed.f_mater_cigbrand, ed.f_produce_date,elm.f_realin_quality as f_actual_quality, elm.f_orderdetail_id,elm.f_cigsmoke_quality,elm.f_tray_rfid,elm.f_local_id,elm.f_local_code,elm.f_local_rfid, elm.f_status as trayStatus,elm.f_sole_code,elm.f_tray_code,elm.f_ware_method, bl.f_status as blStatus FROM t_ware_entrymainorder AS e left JOIN t_ware_entryorderdetail AS ed ON e.f_id = ed.f_mainorder_id LEFT JOIN t_ware_entrytraylocalmap as elm on elm.f_orderdetail_id=ed.f_id LEFT JOIN t_base_locationinfo as bl on elm.f_local_id=bl.f_id WHERE elm.f_tray_rfid = #{trayRfid} and elm.f_status!=1
